Stay mindful while browsing with ZenBlock, the Chrome Extension website blocker designed to take back your time.

Block distracting websites and take back your focus. Utilizing URL redirection, ZenBlock puts you and your goals back on track.

Tired of doomscrolling? We’re here to help.

ZenBlock redirects inputted websites directly to our blocked pages, effectively stopping you from seeing the content that distracts you most. Simply input a website to block, and ZenBlock does the rest.

🪷Features 🪷:  
🌿 Unlimited Website Blocking
Don't let distracting websites chain you down. Eliminate unhealthy internet addictions so you can take care of what's really important. Block unlimited websites, completely free.

🔒 Locked Mode
Be mindful about what you consume in this ever-changing, messy digital world. ZenBlock’s lock feature adds extra protection for when those dopamine cravings hit. 

☸️ Zen Themes and Quotes
ZenBlock offers two themes with beautiful backgrounds and motivational quotes: Temple and Lofi. Temple theme is accompanied by a bell of mindfulness that rings every time you try to access a blocked page - reminding you to stay focused and in the present moment.

Join ZenBlock and take your time, attention span, and focus back. For good.

Want to learn more? ✨Check out our website ✨: zenblock.vercel.app 

🪷ZenBlock Guide 🪷:
Inputted websites need to be added by domain name, not full URL address:
✅example.com 
❌https://www.example.com/
